title: BTS Reveals That Lizzo Has A Crush On Two Members
author: Access
description: Lizzo has a thing for BTS. The K-Pop group chatted with Access Hollywood's Zuri Hall at the 2021 American Music Awards and revealed Lizzo confessed to them in-person that she has a crush on two members of the group. They also revealed what it is like to be back on the AMA stage for the first time in two years.

localize.title: BTS、Lizzoが2人のメンバーに恋していることを明かす
BTS透露Lizzo对两名成员有好感
BTS透露Lizzo對兩名成員有好感
